entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Immigrants 2002. The living conditions of immigrants migrating to Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Dávid, Kriszta
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F39: TÁRKI Immigrants 2002. The living conditions of immigrants migrating to Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2007-01-19
entry.dcterms:creator: Gödri, Irén
Tóth, Pál Péter
entry.dcterms:contributor: Hungarian Central Statistical Office Demographic Research Institute
entry.dcterms:description: education level of immigrants, financial situation before and after arrival, life and working conditions, and the porcess of integration
entry.dcterms:subject: migration
social change
person
survey data
cross-section

Stratified random sample. 1-1 persons were asked from 2543 households of 344 settlements, a total of 1015 persons. The sample included all cities with more than 6 immigrant households, and all big villages with 3, and all villages with more than 1 immigrant households.
face-to-face interview
D
